name: Minimalist (astur_y_as)
description:
Minimalist. The new videogame where you'll have to help the ball to reach the bin. You'll have to avoid a set of obstacles in your way, they will try to destroy you. Put the ball in the bin!

Characteristics:
· Simple graphics (Suitable for people with reduced visibility)
· Easy gameplay
· Relaxing experience
· 120 levels
· Easy to learn, hard to master

Game modes:
· Tutorial mode: Learn the game's basic concepts
· Fixed obstacles: Apply the concepts and avoid the level's obstacles
· Mobile obstacles: Master the concepts avoiding the new mobile elements
· Modo espejo: Face the ultimate test, all levels have been reversed!
